meanings.definition: Having many squiggles or wavy lines.
meanings.sent1: The squiggliest drawing was full of wavy lines and loops.
meanings.sent2: Her notebook was filled with the squiggliest doodles.
meanings.sent3: The squiggliest road on the map led us in circles.
meanings.sent4: The squiggliest tree branches danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The squiggliest pattern on the fabric was mesmerizing.

meanings.sent1: Among all the drawings, hers stood out as the squiggliest.
meanings.sent2: The squiggliest in the art gallery caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The squiggliest at the party was the highlight of the event.
meanings.sent4: She was known for being the squiggliest in her class.
meanings.sent5: The squiggliest on the page seemed to come to life.
